name: The Great Balls Arena
description:
This basic ball-fighting arena for 4 players has been made with a goal of having fun with a couple of friends.

Each player has a 10 seconds window to push the other balls out of the arena, to the dark abyss on the edges, similar to the billiards table holes. 

It gets tricky when there are balls flying all over the arena, but thats why only the best can survive!
